rows.label: qst700804_msg0002
rows.name:
Urgh... Sorry, brotherpon...
Please not to let sacrifice of Ryuuryuu
be in vain!

rows.label: qst700804_msg0101
rows.name:
Oh, I see what's going on here.
You're trying to make yourself
sound like you're the good guys.

rows.label: qst700804_msg0102
rows.name:
But a crime's a crime, and you can't
just pretend it's not! Littering is not
cool on any level!

rows.label: qst700804_msg0201
rows.name: Resigned to your fate, are you?

rows.label: qst700804_msg0202
rows.name:
Then let's see you apologize to the
old lady. Off you go!

rows.label: qst700804_msg0301
rows.name:
I can't approve of you trying to throw
your life away over something so trivial.

rows.label: qst700804_msg0302
rows.name:
Now go and apologize to the lady.
It is only the right thing to do.

rows.label: qst700804_msg0401
rows.name:
Calmed down yet? Then get yourself
to the old lady.

rows.label: qst700804_msg0501
rows.name:
Sacrifice? There's no need for
anything of the sort.

rows.label: qst700804_msg0502
rows.name:
I'm sure the lady will let you off
if you simply apologize for what
you've done.

rows.label: qst700804_msg0601
rows.name:
You can go sacrifice yourself as much
as you want, but first you'll drag your
ass over to the old lady, capisce?

rows.label: qst700804_msg0602
rows.name: You are so in for it now.

rows.label: qst700804_msg0701
rows.name: Relax. We're not going to hurt you.

rows.label: qst700804_msg0702
rows.name:
But you are gonna have to apologize to
the nice old woman, so hop to it.

rows.label: qst700804_msg0801
rows.name:
What's all this talk of sacrifice?
Children shouldn't speak such things.

rows.label: qst700804_msg0802
rows.name:
Now hurry along and apologize
to the lady.

rows.label: qst700804_msg0901
rows.name:
You consider yourself the leader,
do you?

rows.label: qst700804_msg0902
rows.name:
Any good leader knows to choose
his battles wisely. Do the right thing
and apologize to Oulu-san.
